page.title: 18Transport in Fremington Area
page.content: Fremington is one of the small towns that has grown up along the A396, the main road from Barnstaple to Bideford. This road is always busy but in summer it gets very crowded because of the extra traffic caused by all the holiday-makers going to the seaside. Lots of local people don't like it. Every year there are lots of serious road accidents, but it would be difficult to alter the road to make it safer because there are houses all along it. We did a survey using the families in the school to find out about their cars. Nearly every family had a car and some had more. The most common cars were Fords. Red was the most popular colour. Most families did about 200 miles a week, going to work shopping, and going on trips. People with cars almost never used buses.
